name: identifier_patterns
description: Tests validation of NCBI-style identifier formats
notes: SAMPLE003: accession missing underscore, biosample has invalid char X, SRA too short
SAMPLE004: wrong accession prefix XC, biosample too long, SRA has letter, project has X
SAMPLE005: lowercase identifiers (may be valid but inconsistent)
SAMPLE006: hyphens and underscores in wrong places
Current detection: typo validator detects project_id inconsistencies
FUTURE: NCBI identifier pattern validation: NC_######.##, SAMN########, SRR#######, PRJNA######
